cgcloud__Tactic_Product__c.name: cgcloud__Tactic_Product__c
cgcloud__Tactic_Product__c.description: Junction object between Tactic and Product.

Name.description: Unique name of the tactic product.

cgcloud__Default_Value__c.description: Defines the default quantity that can be given to the product in a free item promotion reward context.

cgcloud__Group_Id__c.description: Defines the order of display of the group.

cgcloud__Group_Name__c.description: Product register grouping drives the way that the products are shown in the order.

cgcloud__Group_Sort__c.description: Sort order for the products within a register.

cgcloud__Is_Transferred__c.description: Identifies if the tactic product is transferred.

cgcloud__Max_Value__c.description: Defines the maximum quantity that's given to the product in a free item promotion reward context.

cgcloud__Pct_of_Stores__c.description: Percentage of stores of the account that participate in the tactic.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the Tactic Product related list record.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Reference to the sales org of the product.

cgcloud__TacticIdProductId__c.description: Unique field that validates the product added to the tactic.
